name: gbr-management-system
description: A management system for Green Box Rentals.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server" " npm run client"
scripts.test-all: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha tests/*.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=tests/reports,reportFilename=alltests --timeout 5000 --exit
scripts.test-containers: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha tests/containers.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=tests/reports,reportFilename=containers --timeout 5000 --exit
scripts.test-products: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha tests/products.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=tests/reports,reportFilename=products --timeout 5000 --exit
scripts.test-users: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha tests/users.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=tests/reports,reportFilename=users --timeout 5000 --exit
scripts.test-defaults: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha tests/defaults.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=tests/reports,reportFilename=defaults --timeout 5000 --exit
scripts.test-events: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha tests/events.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=tests/reports,reportFilename=events --timeout 5000 --exit
scripts.test-settings: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha tests/settings.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=tests/reports,reportFilename=settings --timeout 5000 --exit
scripts.test-customers: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha tests/customers.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=tests/reports,reportFilename=customers --timeout 5000 --exit
scripts.test-todos: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha tests/todos.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=tests/reports,reportFilename=todos --timeout 5000 --exit
scripts.test-quotes: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha tests/quotes.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=tests/reports,reportFilename=quotes --timeout 5000 --exit

author: Brian Peter & Taylor Hartley
